metadata.title: CVE-2020-12268 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - low
metadata.description:
jbig2_image_compose in jbig2_image.c in Artifex jbig2dec before 0.18 has aheap-based buffer overflow.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-12268` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

jbig2dec - 0.18-1ubuntu1
libjbig2dec0 - 0.18-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jbig2dec package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.18-1ubuntu1').
